description:
A small key you found in the Ancient Cave. It looks
like it'll fall apart any minute, but somehow it doesn't.
name: Ancient Key

description:
It's just a leek? Get enough of these, and you
might find that looking was worth your while...
name: Leek

description: A simple yellow flower. It's very common.
name: Yellow Flower

description:
A red flower. It's slightly less common than
yellow flowers, but not by much.
name: Red Flower

description:
A blue herb. It's somewhat rare in
comparison to other plants.
name: Blue Herb

description:
A small package you need to bring to the
Village Headman. What could be inside...
name: Small Package

description:
An old key found in a crate in the Village Headman's
house. It's oddly shaped. It feels out of this world...
name: Old Key

description:
A bottle of clean water. It has quite a few uses, its
main one being recovering a small amount of HP. \c[31]+8 HP\c[0]
name: Water Bottle

description:
A small potion. It has an invigorating
taste. If only they were cheaper... \c[31]+30 HP\c[0]
name: Small Potion

description:
A map of Adon. It should help guide you all
the way down the continent.
name: Map of Adon

description:
An empty book given to you by the Village Headman.
The pages are blank - try to fill 'em up!
name: Quest Log

description: A sticky vial of gel you collected from a Green Slime. \c[31]+1 HP\c[0]
name: Green Gel
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Recovery>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
Some loot that the Banditos pilfered from the
citizens of somewhere. It'd be best to return it.
name: Bandito Loot

description:
An MP-healing variant of the Small Potion. It
sparkles slightly. Is there a still version? \c[16]+12 MP\c[0]
name: Small Elixir

description:
A key to Room 1 of the Verdin Village inn.
It's a literal key item.
name: Room 1 Key

description:
A ration of food. It smells delicious, and will
surely taste delicious... mmm! \c[31]+10 HP\c[0]
name: Ration

description:
A magic bag made by Matilda. It allows all
your team members to access the same inventory.
name: Void Bag

description:
It's a tent. There's nothing too special about it.
It does fold nicely into a little container, though.
name: Tent

description:
An even tastier ration. It smells more delicious than
ever, and will surely taste incredible... mmm! \c[31]+30 HP\c[0]
name: Fulfilling Ration

description:
A bottle of gel you collected from a Blue Slime. It
looks like water... why not give it a taste? \c[31]+2 HP\c[0]
name: Blue Gel
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Recovery>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1-x2 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A ration of rat jerky. It doesn't look too tasty...
it should be nutritious though, right? \c[31]+6 HP\c[0]
name: Ration (Rat Jerky)

description:
It's some fur from a Giant Rat. Gross! It can't
make anything useful, so you might as well sell it.
name: Rat Fur
note:
<Menu Category: Drops>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1-x2 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A dusty old book. When read, your EXP from
battles will get a boost. Lasts 800 steps.
name: Tome of Experience

description:
An old bit of Kevin's cape that tore off
in your battle with him.
name: Kevin's Cape Scrap

description:
An annoyingly hard-to-handle key. All it
opens is the cells in the Bandito Hideout.
name: Cell Key

description:
A strange badge you found in Four-Toed Kevin's room.
It fills you with the desire to take on a strong foe.
name: Mysterious Red Badge

description:
A smooth cherry-flavored drink that boosts
your MHP by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Vital Cola

description:
A fizzy blueberry-flavored drink that boosts
your MMP by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Mana Fizz

description:
A viscous almond-flavored drink that boosts
your DEF by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Rocky Sip

description:
A spicy grape-flavored drink that boosts
your MAT by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Arcanic Chug

description:
Some cool looking dust that Bob and James found.
It might be gold!... but it's probably just sand.
name: Cool Dust

description:
Heal up quicker and save some turns!
Buy these up! Or use skills. \c[31]+60 HP\c[0]
name: Potion

description:
It's even sparklier than the \ii[14]. You'd
better like the fizz, 'cause there's a lot. \c[16]+24 MP\c[0]
name: Elixir

description:
Recovers a ton of HP and MP. You'd better not be full just
yet - there's a lotta' juice in here. \c[31]+250 HP\c[0] \c[16]+100 MP\c[0]
name: Recovery Vat

description: Boosts the ATK of a weapon by +2.
name: ATK Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
ATK: +2
Prefix: Pointy
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description: Boosts the MAT of a weapon by +2.
name: MAT Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
MAT: +2
Prefix: Mystic
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description: Ok, not gonna' lie, that's kinda' gross.
name: Skeleton Skull
note:
<Menu Category: Drops>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x2-x3 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
The bloody, beaten skull of Laeryidyean. Once belonging
to a very strong being, but now just a simple trophy.
name: Laeyridyean's Skull

description: A soul that you took from a tough monster.
name: Boss Soul (Mini-Boss)

description: A soul that you took from a very strong monster.
name: Boss Soul (Region Boss)

description:
A soul that you took from the
strongest monster in a dimension.
name: Boss Soul (Dimension Boss)

description:
A letter that Jack wrote. It allows
you access to the Mayor of Greenfield.
name: Letter of Recommendation

description:
A simple yet versatile crafting item. It can be
used to make a variety of different objects.
name: Wood
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>
<Sell Price: 2>

<Disassemble Pool: Wood>
x1-3 Bark: 100%
x1 Stick: 75%
</Disassemble Pool: Wood>

description:
A small bead of water surrounded by a crystalline
shell. Can be used to craft water-related items.
name: Aqua Gem

description:
A loaf of organic whole wheat bread. Made
with care and tastiness in mind. \c[31]+12 HP\c[0]
name: Loaf of Bread

description:
A good ol' apple: as tasty and revitalizing as always. You
can probably make some apple-based foods with this. \c[31]+5% HP\c[0]
name: Apple

description:
Some bark that you stripped off a piece of wood.
You can probably use it as kindling for a small fire.
name: Bark

description: Boosts the DEF of a headgear, bodygear, or footgear by +2.
name: DEF Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
DEF: +2
Prefix: Hard
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description: Boosts the MDF of a headgear, bodygear, or footgear by +2.
name: MDF Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
MDF: +2
Prefix: Warding
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description:
Allows basic disassembling of softer items, typically
clothing and food. Cannot work with metal items.
name: Basic Salvage Kit

description:
A piece of cloth salvaged from an well-worn piece
of clothing. Only somewhat useful when in bulk.
name: Worn Cloth

description:
A small feather appearing to have originated
from the plumage of a small bird.
name: Feather

description:
It's easily dyed and is used to make a variety of
fine attire. Can be bought or salvaged from clothing.
name: Yarn

description:
Reverts all changes and upgrades on any weapon or
piece of equipment, freeing up all upgrade slots.
name: Cleansing Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Armor Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
Slots: 0
Reset Full
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description:
A piece of a map of Telluria. It's cut off at the
point where it's no use to you without the rest.
name: Telluria Map Fragment

description: I got a rock.
name: Rock

description:
Slightly coarse, slightly smooth,
slightly tough, and a great material.
name: Leather

description:
An extremely large fang. Its tip
is sharp enough to cut rocks.
name: Giant Goblin's Fang

description:
A gritty chicken-flavored drink that boosts
your ATK by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Brawl Brew

description:
A sparkly huckleberry-flavored drink that boosts
your MDF by 15%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Warding Swig

description:
A small purse filled with Bits and various items.
You retreived it from the Dandy Toads; now return it!
name: Peasant Woman's Purse

description:
A small bit of iron. The iron ore nodes which provide
these can be commonly found all over Telluria.
name: Iron Cluster

description: A powerful red crystal used in a specific crafting recipe.
name: Life Crystal
note:
Was once the itemized Leather Boots.
<Menu Category: Materials>

description: A magical blue crystal used in a specific crafting recipe.
name: Mana Crystal
note:
Was once the itemized Bronze Sword â˜….
<Menu Category: Materials>

description:
A small bit of copper. The copper ore nodes which
provide these can be frequently found all over Telluria.
name: Copper Cluster

description:
A small bit of bronze. Bronze is an alloy of tin and copper, but
tin naturally found within forges can create the alloy with time.
name: Bronze Alloy
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>
<Sell Price: 20>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Copper Cluster: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Copper-based Alloy>

description:
A somewhat flimsy hammer necessary for carrying out especially difficult forging
procedures. The lack of durability is what makes it helpful, but it's not cheap.
name: Disposable Hammer

description:
A combination of a few delicious foods. The
tastes compliment each other quite well. \c[31]+10% HP\c[0]
name: Quick Snack
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, cook1, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Apple: 1
Carrot: 1
Loaf of Bread: 1
Empty Bag: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Tasty Food Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A combination of a \ii[9] and \ii[14].
It's smooth yet sparkly at the same time. \c[31]+36 HP\c[0] \c[16]+15 MP\c[0]
name: Small Ether
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, cook1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Small Potion: 1
Small Elixir: 1
Water Bottle: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Small Recovery Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A combination of a \ii[32] and \ii[33]. The recovery is
great, as well as the contrasting flavors! \c[31]+72 HP\c[0] \c[16]+30 MP\c[0]
name: Ether
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, cook1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Potion: 1
Elixir: 1
Water Bottle: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Recovery Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A small bit of steel. Steel is a simple alloy created by
heating up iron in a blast furnace at high temperatures.
name: Steel Alloy
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>
<Sell Price: 30>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Iron Cluster: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Iron-based Alloy>

name: RETRO RECIPES
note:
Was once the Clothing Recipes.
<Item Recipe: 179>
<Armor Recipe: 109, 110, 111, 112>

description:
A base staff that can be used for crafting. Reinforcing,
enchanting, and all the like can be used on it.
name: Wooden Staff
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Wood: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Staff for Crafting>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

name: SHOE RECIPES
note:
Was once the itemized Bloodlust.
<Armor Recipe: 46, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133>

description:
It's a fish. Good for slapping, but unsafe to be
consumed raw... you should cook something with it!
name: Raw Fish

description:
A shiny gem necessary for carrying out especially difficult
enchanting procedures. It strengthens the magic of a forge.
name: Enchanting Crystal

description:
It's just a stick, nothing too special. You can
probably use it for some crafting, though.
name: Stick

description:
A bottle filled and stained with red gel. It's too hot
for consumption, but it can be thrown to start a fire.
name: Red Gel
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Debuffs>
<Remove State Category: Ice>
<Remove State Category: Water>

<Enemy or Actor Select>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x2-x4 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
The severed wing of a bat. It can be
sold or used as a material for crafting.
name: Bat Wing
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Materials>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x3-x4 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A plump red tomato. Can come in various different
colors, but is typically found and grown red. \c[31]+5% HP\c[0]
name: Tomato
note:
Was once the itemization kit.

<Menu Category: Recovery, Foodstuffs>

description:
The essence of hot creatures. Dropped by
fire-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Fire Essence

description:
The essence of cold creatures. Dropped by
ice-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Ice Essence

description:
The essence of conductive creatures. Dropped by
electric-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Electric Essence

description:
The essence of wet creatures. Dropped by
water-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Water Essence

description:
The essence of rocky creatures. Dropped by
earth-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Earth Essence

description:
The essence of airy creatures. Dropped by
wind-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Wind Essence

description:
The essence of holy creatures. Dropped by
light-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Light Essence

description:
The essence of evil creatures. Dropped by
dark-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Dark Essence

description:
A skull frequently found in graveyards, placed by
those hoping to bring back a lost loved one.
name: Necrotic Skull
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Drops>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Skeleton Skull: 1
Dark Essence: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Symbolic Skull>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Revives a party member with a sliver of HP. A real
one can only be plucked from the ashes of a phoenix.
name: Phoenix Feather Replica
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Feather: 1
Fire Essence: 5
Charcoal: 5
Necrotic Skull: 1
Ground Monster Parts: 30
Enchanting Crystal: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Revival Feather Replica>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A juicy carrot! It restores a mediocre amount of HP, but you
can probably make better use of it through cooking. \c[31]+5% HP\c[0]
name: Carrot

description:
A small egg taken from the nest of a bird. It's too
messy to eat out in the field, but it's great for cooking.
name: Egg

description:
A simple mushroom plucked from the ground. It restores barely
any HP raw, but it can make or break a recipe. \c[31]+3 HP\c[0]
name: Brown Mushroom

description:
A bit of salt extracted from rocks in Bladesville and
put into a small container. Inedible in this form.
name: Salt

description:
A simple yet delicious omelet.
The flavor is immaculate! \c[31]+75 HP\c[0]
name: Omelet
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Egg: 1
Brown Mushroom: 2
Salt: 1
Empty Bag: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Breakfast Dish>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
An ancient relic forged in the shifting sands of the
desert. Has the power to turn back time itself.
name: Archaic Hourglass

description:
An assortment of items that Will needs to keep the
forge going. You should get them back to him!
name: Will's Items

description:
A simple pickaxe required for mining ores. Its
imbalance makes it useless for combat, though.
name: Iron Pickaxe

description:
A simple arrow used as ammunition for bows. It's
not that strong, but it's cheap and effective.
name: Wooden Arrow

description:
A bullet used as basic gun ammunition. Its stronger
than an arrow, but it's more expensive to buy.
name: Iron Bullet

description:
Douse yourself in this disgusting fluid that will
make monsters leave you alone for 100 steps.
name: Acrid Aroma
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Ground Monster Parts: 10
Water Bottle: 1
Gold: 50
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Monster Repellant>

description:
Douse yourself in this lovely liquid that will
attract twice as many monsters to you for 150 steps.
name: Eau du Monstere
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Ground Monster Parts: 10
Water Bottle: 1
Gold: 50
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Monster Perfume>

description:
A variation of mushroom that is extremely poisonous.
It's not something you want to ever eat!
name: Red Mushroom

description:
Some simple uncooked meat from an average-sized bear. It's
unsafe to eat raw, but it's great for cooking. \c[31]+20 HP\c[0]
name: Raw Bear Meat

description:
A simple meal made by cooking meat and
sprinkling some salt over it. \c[31]+40 HP\c[0]
name: Salt-Grilled Bear Meat
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Raw Bear Meat: 1
Salt: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Preserved Food>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A strand of wheat, a grain mainly grown in the Easin Plains.
It's inedible, but quite the versatile cooking ingredient.
name: Wheat

description:
A sweet cube of sugar processed from cane harvested
on the shores of Telluria. Cannot be eaten by itself.
name: Sugar Cube

description:
A delicious cake! The apple and blueberry inside compliment
each other pefectly, surprisingly. \c[31]+15% +80 HP\c[0]
name: Fruitcake
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Apple: 2
Blueberries: 3
Sugar Cube: 3
Wheat: 3
Egg: 1
Empty Bag: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fruity Dessert>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A cluster of blueberries native to the forests
of Adon. Useful in cooking. \c[31]+1% +2 HP\c[0] \c[16]+1 MP\c[0]
name: Blueberries

description:
An inconspicuous belt resonating with a mix of light
and dark power. Wearing it would certainly kill you.
name: The Warden's Belt

description:
A broken, beat-up, and useless helmet. Without the power
of soulfire, it has lost its colors and strong magic.
name: Forgotten General's Helmet

description:
A tiny pair of boots that once belonged to Henry. His shoe
size is so small that no one in the party can fit in these.
name: Henry's Tiny Boots

description:
A silver key that opens the right-most door Sam Payne's
basement. The door leads to the Haven Harbor Underground.
name: Sam's Key

description: A bottle of bitter medicine. Cures \it[39]\c[0].
name: Antidote
note:
<Menu Category: Debuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Red Mushroom
Charcoal
Blue Herb
Water Bottle
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Poison Preventer>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A small journal detailing the intricacies
of elements. It was gifted to you by Mark.
name: Elemental Guide

description:
A book containing the Village Headman's
scribbled notes about classes and equipment.
name: Equipment Guide

description:
A small, tasty berry that grows in warm regions. Heals a
bit of HP and removes cold and wet status effects. \c[31]+10 HP\c[0]
name: Heedup Berry
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Drops, Foodstuffs>
<Remove State Category: Ice>
<Remove State Category: Water>

description:
A peculiar book that allows an experienced
adventurer to boost their intelligence.
name: INT Book

description:
A certificate granted to you for defeating
a rare variant of an enemy. Nice job!
name: Rare Enemy Certificate

description:
A poorly made fishing rod. It looks
like it'll snap at any moment.
name: Flimsy Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:3>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Wood: 10
Yarn: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: First Fishing Rod>

description:
A slightly better rod that can catch weak fish faster and easier than
before. It also opens the doors to catch a couple stronger types of fish.
name: Basic Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:5>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Flimsy Rod
Petrified Wood: 5
Tarantula Silk: 3
Frozen Core
Bronze Alloy: 2
Steel Alloy
Fathead Carp: 10
Whiskerfish: 3
Northern Redbelly Dace: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Improved Fishing Rod>

description:
A strengthened rod capable of catching
bigger, faster, and stronger fish.
name: Reinforced Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:7>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Basic Rod
Enchanted Dragon Scale
Steel Alloy: 8
Disposable Hammer
Blue Crab
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Powerful Fishing Rod>

description:
"I've got bigger fish to fry..."
A small, weak fish found in many open fishing spots.
name: Fathead Carp

description:
A particularly appealing specimen of small fish
due to its red stripe going across its belly.
name: Northern Redbelly Dace

description:
A weak yet easily accessible bait. Can catch
basic types of small fish, but not much else.
name: Worm

description:
A high-quality bag made specifically for
long-term storage of food and snacks.
name: Empty Bag

description:
A handful of generic nuts that could have
been plucked from any old tree or bush.
name: Nuts

description:
A tasty mix of nuts, honey, and oats. It could probably be used
as an ingredient for something even tastier. \c[31]+5% +20 HP\c[0]
name: Granola
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Materials, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Nuts: 5
Honey: 1
Processed Oats: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Breakfast Food + Ingredient>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A jar of high-quality honey harvested directly
from a bee's nest... or stolen by a bear.
name: Honey

description:
Processed organic oats ready
to be used for cooking.
name: Processed Oats
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Oats: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Refined Grain>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A heated cluster of blueberries with all
the moisture evaporated. Inedible on its own.
name: Dried Blueberries
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Blueberries: 1
Fiery Powder
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Demoisturized Fruit>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
The ultimate snack for a long, long journey.
Removes debuffs. \c[31]+60% +150 HP\c[0]
name: Trail Mix
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>
<Remove State Category: weak debuff>
<Remove State Category: debuff>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Granola: 3
Dried Blueberries: 2
Nuts: 5
Heedup Berry: 1
Ether: 1
Monsterous Seasoning: 2
Empty Bag: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Wild Snack Mix>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A well-roasted fish. The heat brought out the nutrition
within; however, it's lost its slappy qualities. \c[31]+50 HP\c[0]
name: Cooked Fish
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fish: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Warmed-up Seafood>

description:
A very old charm you found in a small box. Touching it brings
back someone's strange flashbacks you've never experienced.
name: Ancient Charm

description:
An incredibly rare and beautiful phoenix feather. Revives a downed ally,
restores all HP and MP, and buffs all stats by 3 stages for 5 turns.
name: Phoenix Feather

description:
A mystical feather that allows the owner to jump up to
2 blocks in any direction. Quivers in usable dungeons.
name: Jump Feather

description:
A bottle of ground-up monster parts. It...
looks disgusting. Useful for crafting.
name: Ground Monster Parts

description:
A curious portable machine that allows you to
grind monster parts into \ii[141].
name: Monster Part Grinder

description:
A strange seasoning created using \ii[141]. It should be
disgusting, but it surprisingly adds a wonderful depth of flavor.
name: Monsterous Seasoning
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Ground Monster Parts: 20
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Monster-Made Ingredient>

description:
A peculiar key used to unlock doors in
Laeryidyean's Forest. Breaks upon use.
name: Skeleton Key

description:
A tough set of golden bracers that allows
you to move heavier boulders than before.
name: Arm Bracers

description:
A peculiar vial of gel collected from a Rainbow Slime.
It lost its varying colors after the slime dissolved.
name: White Gel

description:
A clump of incredibly smooth fur collected
from the corpse of a rare Albino Rat.
name: Albino Rat Fur

description:
Colorless leather collected from the clothes of a peculiar
Strange Goblin. Despite its scarcity, it's not useful for crafting.
name: Bleached Leather

description:
A leftover bottle that's a little too big to afford to
throw away, unlike a small vial. Very repurposable.
name: Empty Bottle

description:
Powdery residue produced by intensely heating wood.
All water and volatile constituents have been removed.
name: Charcoal
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Wood: 1
Bark: 5
Fiery Powder
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Wood Remnants>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A strange badge you found in the Village Headman's
chimney. It fills you with the desire to help others.
name: Mysterious Green Badge

description:
A peculiar charm that feels like it's phasing through your
hand. Allows the holder to interact with the Phantasmal Plane.
name: Phantasmal Charm

description:
A special salvage kit that allows
you to take apart \ii[43].
name: Wood Salvage Kit
note:
<Disassembler: Wood>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Woodcutting Axe: 1
Copper Cluster: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Another Salvager>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A bottle of utterly untainted water, taken straight
from the Water Elemental. Drinking it would be a waste.
name: Water Elemental's Pure Water

description:
Happy holidays! Used to purchase special equipment
from the holiday merchant during the holiday season.
name: Present

I had just one query...
Boosts HRG by 5%. Lasts for 10 turns.
name: Fizzy Cranberry Beverage
note:

<Item 156 Sell Price: 2>

description:
A large container that holds a sizable
amount of water. Very refreshing! \c[31]+24 HP\c[0]
name: Water Jug

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description:
A handful of powdered tellurium, a relatively rare element.
Can be mined at low depths within the continent of Telluria.
name: Tellurium Dust

description:
A powerful alloy that requires several materials to be
forged. Should be chemically impossible, but here we are.
name: Tellurium Alloy
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>
<Sell Price: 250>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Dust: 2
Bronze Alloy: 3
Steel Alloy: 2
Disposable Hammer: 2
Fire Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Powerful Alloy>

description:
An empty magical tome with no remarkable properties.
It is, however, very useful in certain crafting recipes.
name: Blank Tome

description:
A strange badge you found in the Dark Forest. It
fills you with the desire to travel the world.
name: Mysterious Yellow Badge

description:
An amalgam of all three mysterious badges, which managed to traverse time
and space and arrive here from the demo. Salvage this for a nice surprise!
name: Andrew's Ancient Crystal of The Trail's Amazing History
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Mysterious Yellow Badge: 1
Mysterious Green Badge: 1
Mysterious Red Badge: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: ???>
<Synthesis SE: Powerup>
<Synthesis Volume: 150>
<Synthesis Pitch: 50>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1 Knight Token: 100%
x1 Mage Token: 100%
x1 Cleric Token: 100%
x1 Rogue Token: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: Used for crafting the \ia[109].
name: Knight Token

description: Used for crafting the \ia[110].
name: Mage Token

description: Used for crafting the \ia[111].
name: Cleric Token

description: Used for crafting the \ia[112].
name: Rogue Token

description:
A powerful pickaxe with the ability
to break through tellurium ore.
name: Tellurium Pickaxe
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Iron Pickaxe: 1
Tellurium Dust: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Pickaxe Upgrade>

description:
Half of an ancient tablet found at the peak of an ancient tree.
The complete artifact can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet Piece (Left)

description:
Half of an ancient tablet found within a frozen labyrinth.
The complete artifact can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet Piece (Right)

description:
A powerful ancient artifact created and split into two by a group
of mages 1000 years ago. Can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Golden Tablet Piece (Left)
Golden Tablet Piece (Right)
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: The Key>
<Synthesis SE: Magic3>

description:
A magical herb with defensive properties. Useful
for crafting. Can buff your DEF a bit in battle.
name: Thick-Skinned Herb

description:
A shard of a turtle's shell. Can be used
for a few specific crafting recipes.
name: Turtle Scute
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Drops>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x4-x6 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A simple block of frozen water. Can be
used to chill certain foods and drinks.
name: Ice Cube

description:
The strongest potion you'll find in a normal shop. Heals
more than enough HP for the average traveler. \c[31]+120 HP\c[0]
name: Large Potion

description:
The fizziness is almost overwhelming. You can feel each individual
carbon dioxide atom enter your body. Embrace the fizz. \c[16]+48 MP\c[0]
name: Large Elixir

description:
A somewhat rare root dropped by certain enemies.
Very useful for crafting medicinal items.
name: Medicinal Root

description:
A rather common herb dropped by certain enemies.
Very useful for crafting medicinal items.
name: Medicinal Herb

description:
A carefully brewed potion made with natural ingredients.
It's a bit bitter, but can cure a variety of common debuffs.
name: Dispel Potion
note:
<Menu Category: Debuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Water Bottle
Medicinal Herb: 3
Medicinal Root: 2
Ice Cube: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Debuff Healer>

description:
A medical alternative to phoenix feathers; revives
a fallen party member. It's not magic, it's science!
name: Stimulant
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Water Bottle
Medicinal Herb: 10
Medicinal Root: 5
Ice Cube: 15
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Reviver>

description:
The scale of a dragon which you chipped off during
battle. Used to craft a variety of powerful equipment.
name: Dragon Scale
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Drops>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x6-x10 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A super powerful scale that fell off of Dilong, Dragon of Nature.
Baby Dragons will be able to drop these after Dilong's defeat.
name: Enchanted Dragon Scale
note:
<Menu Category: Materials, Drops>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x15-x25 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A single bead of Dilong's tears, immediately
crystallized upon touching a small bit of metal.
name: Dilong's Tear

description:
A wing torn off of a Feral Bat during combat.
Much more potent than a normal \ii[82].
name: Feral Bat Wing
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Materials>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x4-x6 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
An herb with a punchy flavoring to it.
Can buff your ATK a bit in battle.
name: Vicious Herb

description:
An uncooked fungal growth with poison running through its pores.
It's dangerous to eat without preparing it first. \c[31]+3% HP\c[0]
name: Raw Truffle

description:
Even though it looks like normal wood, it's been practically
turned to stone after decades of exposure to wet sediments.
name: Petrified Wood

description:
A wad of solidified web fluid dropped
by a spider after its death.
name: Web Ball

description:
A vial of a dangerous toxin taken from a
venomous enemy. You can drink it... but why?
name: Vial of Poison

description:
A high(er)-tech salvage kit that allows for the
disassembling of more complex items and equipment.
name: Advanced Salvage Kit
note:
<Disassembler: Advanced>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Petrified Wood: 20
Tarantula Silk: 10
Feral Bat Wing: 10
Turtle Scute: 5
Steel Alloy: 2
Bronze Alloy: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Stronger Salvager>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A powerful pickaxe with the ability to break through
tellurium ore. Reduces oreleaf respawn time by 50%.
name: Tellurium Pickaxe â˜…
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Pickaxe: 1
Bronze Alloy: 20
Steel Alloy: 10
Tellurium Alloy: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fertilizing Pickaxe>

description:
A pickaxe that can break through tellurium. Reduces oreleaf
respawn time by 50%. Grants an extra ore when mining.
name: Tellurium Pickaxe â˜…â˜…
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Pickaxe â˜…: 1
Bronze Alloy: 40
Steel Alloy: 20
Tellurium Alloy: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fortunate Pickaxe>

description:
Can break tellurium. Reduces oreleaf respawn time by 50%.
Grants an extra ore when mining. Produces Bits when mining.
name: Tellurium Pickaxe â˜…â˜…â˜…
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Pickaxe â˜…â˜…: 1
Bronze Alloy: 60
Steel Alloy: 30
Tellurium Alloy: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Gilded Pickaxe>

description: Boosts the INT of a headgear by +2.
name: INT Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3>
<Upgrade Effect>
LUK: +2
Prefix: Smart
</Upgrade Effect>

<Menu Category: Upgraders>

description:
A mysterious type of essence dropped
by dark enemies in the Blazing Sands.
name: Malicious Essence

description: A vile, dark metal. It seems to radiate evil energy.
name: Shadowspec Ingot
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>
<Sell Price: 50>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Bronze Alloy
Steel Alloy
Malicious Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>

description:
A fine line of yarn reinforced
with the webs of a large spider.
name: Tarantula Silk
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Yarn
Web Ball
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fine Material>

description:
A chilly singularity of heavily concentrated ice.
Dropped by enemies in the Frozen Labyrinth.
name: Frozen Core
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Materials>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x10-15 Ice Cube: 100%
x1-2 Ice Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A small sample of sub-zero gel
contained within an airtight vial.
name: Icy Gel
note:
<Menu Category: Drops, Materials>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x3-5 item 141: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A musical instrument that produces a very shrill yet
beautiful sound. Allows you to slow the passage of time.
name: Magical Ocarina

description:
A deafening horn that can pierce through the loudest of noise. Use
it inside a dungeon to respawn all enemies inside. Consumed on use.
name: Battle Cry
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Wood: 5
Dark Essence: 2
Ground Monster Parts: 50
Enchanting Crystal: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Monster Caller>

description:
A zesty fruit that explodes into flavor upon a single bite.
Incredible on its own, but a meal with it might be even better...
name: Dragonfruit

description:
A funny-looking fish due to the appendages located on its
chin and the sides of the mouth. It uses these to detect food.
name: Whiskerfish

description:
A tasty group meal consisting of a few common
fish found in Telluria Field's waters. \c[31]+40 HP\c[0]
name: Seafood Meal
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fathead Carp
Whiskerfish
Northern Redbelly Dace
Empty Bag
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Shared Seafood>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Beginning as a genetic mutation, this crustacean grew to become a regular sight on the
beaches of Telluria. It only coming out at night serves to help it hide from predators.
name: Blue Crab

description:
Chopped up, fried, and light garnished crab makes for a
simple yet elegant dish. It's tasty, too! \c[31]+10% HP\c[0] \c[16]+20% MP\c[0]
name: Mana Fritters
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery, Buffs, Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Blue Crab
Starfruit
Empty Bag
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Magical Seafood>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
This fruit, while lightly poisonous, isn't dangerous to humans. It's said
that it contains magical qualities that can spice up any dish. \c[31]+5% HP\c[0] \c[16]+5% MP\c[0]
name: Starfruit

description: Material used to craft the \ia[168] and \ia[124].
name: Wind Catalyst

description:
A combination of several drinks that boosts
most of your core stats by 15% for 10 turns.
name: Well-Rounded Combination
note:
<Menu Category: Buffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Vital Cola
Mana Fizz
Rocky Sip
Arcanic Chug
Brawl Brew
Warding Swig
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Buffing Time Saver>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A pale bat wing with magical
energy radiating from it.
name: Ethereal Bat Wing

description:
A flute with a peculiar lull that can only be described as slightly
eerie. \c[2]Using it in a certain location may have unintended consequences.\c[0]
name: Ethereal Flute
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Steel Alloy: 2
Feral Bat Wing: 10
Enchanting Crystal: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Forest Summoner>

description:
A bit of monster essence broken
down into a warm powder.
name: Fiery Powder
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fire Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Broken-Down Essence>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
The basic tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Allows access to the Telluria Castle Town branch.
name: Adventurer's Guild Bronze Membership

description:
The intermediate tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Allows access to all Adventurer's Guild establishments.
name: Adventurer's Guild Silver Membership

description:
The highest tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Provides no special benefits other than flexing... for now.
name: Adventurer's Guild Gold Membership

description: Boosts the EVA of a headgear, bodygear, or footgear by 0.75%.
name: EVA Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
Eval: item.traits.push({code: 22, dataId: 1, value: 0.0075});
Prefix: Evasive
</Upgrade Effect>

A bundle of organic oats, a cereal grain frequently grown as
livestock feed. Can be refined into a very healthy ingredient.
name: Oats
